/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban structures. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. Vehicles, including cars and buses, are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban landscapes. The sky itself is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
